channel.title: Development on Tomi Mulhartono
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Tomi Mulhartono

item.title: Ordera: Your Ultimate Destination for Seamless Food and Beverage Delivery in Indonesia
item.description: Overview Ordera, the brainchild of innovative minds at PT Motiolabs Digital Indonesia, has transformed the way Indonesians experience food delivery. In this blog post, I delve into the journey of creating Ordera, an app that not only connects users with their favorite eateries but also revolutionizes the food delivery landscape in Indonesia. Building Ordera: A Journey of Innovation In the bustling world of food delivery apps, Ordera stands out as a beacon of convenience and efficiency.

item.title: SITERPADU Unleashed: My Odyssey as a Full Stack Developer at Bandung Techno Park
item.description: Overview Hey, tech enthusiasts! Today, I’m thrilled to guide you through an electrifying expedition during my tenure as a Full Stack Developer at Bandung Techno Park. Brace yourselves as we plunge into the dynamic world of SITERPADU, the groundbreaking platform reshaping academic administration at Universitas Jenderal Achmad Yani. Join me as I narrate the captivating tale of revolutionizing graduation procedures within the formidable framework of SITERPADU. Embracing the Challenge At the dawn of 2022, I found myself at the forefront of innovation, poised to tackle the challenges ahead.

item.title: Unveiling the Making of COVID-19 WebGIS: A Journey in Digital Mapping and Visual Storytelling
item.description: In the fast-paced world of tech, the development of applications often reflects the urgency of the times. My stint as a Web Developer intern at PT Sketsa Negeri Mandiri thrust me into the heart of this narrative, where alongside a dynamic duo, I embarked on a mission to contribute to the fight against COVID-19 through digital innovation. The Genesis: Taking Over the Baton Embarking on this project in the midst of a global pandemic was akin to stepping into a whirlwind.
